org.gbif.portal.action.occurrence.util

Class FiltersActionHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.gbif.portal.action.occurrence.util.FiltersActionHelper

  • public class FiltersActionHelper
extends Object
    Utility class for common operations of SearchAction and DownloadHomeAction.

      • getCountryTitle

        public String getCountryTitle(String isoCode)
        Gets the title(name) of a country.
        Parameters:
        isoCode - iso 2/3 country code

      • getCurrentYear

        public int getCurrentYear()
        Gets the current year. This value is used by occurrence filters to determine the maximum year that is allowed for the OccurrenceSearchParamater.DATE.

      • getDatasetTitle

        public String getDatasetTitle(String key)
        Gets the Dataset title, the key parameter is returned if either the Dataset doesn't exists or it doesn't have a title.

      • getFilterTitle

        public String getFilterTitle(String filterKey,
                    String filterValue)
        Gets the displayable value of filter parameter.

      • getGeoreferencedTitle

        public String getGeoreferencedTitle(String value)

      • getNetworkTitle

        public String getNetworkTitle(String networkKey)
        Gets the title(name) of a node.
        Parameters:
        networkKey - node key/UUID

      • getScientificName

        public String getScientificName(String taxonKey)
        Gets a scientific name associated to the taxon key parameter. If a name usage doesn't exist for that taxon key, the same key is returned.

      • getSpatialIssuesTitle

        public String getSpatialIssuesTitle(String value)

      • processCatalogNumberSuggestions

        public SearchSuggestions<String> processCatalogNumberSuggestions(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
        Searches for suggestion to all the CATALOG_NUMBER parameter values, if the input value has an exact match against any suggestion, no suggestions are returned for that parameter.

      • processCollectionCodeSuggestions

        public SearchSuggestions<String> processCollectionCodeSuggestions(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
        Searches for suggestion to all the COLLECTION_CODE parameter values, if the input value has an exact match against any suggestion, no suggestions are returned for that parameter.

      • processCollectorSuggestions

        public SearchSuggestions<String> processCollectorSuggestions(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
        Searches for suggestion to all the COLLECTOR_NAME parameter values, if the input value has an exact match against any suggestion, no suggestions are returned for that parameter.

      • processDatasetReplacements

        public void processDatasetReplacements(org.gbif.api.model.common.search.SearchRequest<org.gbif.api.model.occurrence.search.OccurrenceSearchParameter> searchRequest,
                              SearchSuggestions<org.gbif.api.model.registry.search.DatasetSearchResult> suggestions)
        Replace the DATASET_KEY parameters that have a scientific name that could be interpreted directly.

      • processDatasetSuggestions

        public SearchSuggestions<org.gbif.api.model.registry.search.DatasetSearchResult> processDatasetSuggestions(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
        Validates if a string (not an UUID) value was sent for the DATASET_KEY parameter. If the value is not a number, a search by dataset title is performed and, if any, the available suggestions are returned.

      • processInstitutionCodeSuggestions

        public SearchSuggestions<String> processInstitutionCodeSuggestions(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
        Searches for suggestion to all the INSTITUTION_CODE parameter values, if the input value has an exact match against any suggestion, no suggestions are returned for that parameter.

      • processNameUsageReplacements

        public void processNameUsageReplacements(org.gbif.api.model.common.search.SearchRequest<org.gbif.api.model.occurrence.search.OccurrenceSearchParameter> searchRequest,
                                SearchSuggestions<org.gbif.api.model.checklistbank.search.NameUsageSearchResult> suggestions)
        Replace the taxon_key parameters that have a scientific name that could be interpreted directly.

      • processNameUsagesSuggestions

        public SearchSuggestions<org.gbif.api.model.checklistbank.search.NameUsageSearchResult> processNameUsagesSuggestions(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
        Validates if a string (not a number) value was sent for the TAXON_KEY parameter. If the value is not a number, a search by scientific name is performed and, if any, the available suggestions are returned.

      • validateSearchParameters

        public List<ParameterValidationError<org.gbif.api.model.occurrence.search.OccurrenceSearchParameter>> validateSearchParameters(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request,
                                                                                                                      EnumSet<org.gbif.api.model.occurrence.search.OccurrenceSearchParameter> discardedParams)
        Checks if the search parameter contains correct values. The occurrence parameter in the EnumSey discarded are not validated.
